segments.text: So Peter , do you have a favorite comedy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that's hard to say because there are so many good ones . I don't think I could pick a favorite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know what comedy I really like ? " Ace Ventura , Pet Detective . " I think Jim Carry is really funny .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yeah , that's one of my favorite flicks . I think Jim Carry is one of the funniest comedians ever .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree . But even though I like comedies , I usually prefer more serious films . My favorite movie is " Titanic . "
segments.speaker: S1
